short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that reminds programmers to take a break from coding!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension called "Codeication" that allows programmers to choose how long they want to tackle programming activities or problems. Because sometimes programmers get stubborn and choose not to take breaks and code for endless hours! Thus, this extension will allow you to choose a time, once that time is over, depending on what website you're currently viewing, all text in that website will be replaced with a colorful phrase within the page to remind you to take a break!
